title: Uber hired oligarch-linked Russian lobbyist despite bribery fears
content:
1. Uber hired oligarch-linked Russian lobbyist despite bribery fears  The Guardian
  2. Uber whistleblower Mark MacGann source of Uber Files data leak  The Washington Post
  3. Thousands of leaked Uber documents show extreme steps company allegedly took to expand aggressively  CNN
  4. The Uber files tell a simple truth: democracy depends on curbing mercenary tech giants  The Guardian
  5. Big Tech's Reckoning Won't Stop With Uber  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: Uberは、贈収賄の恐れがあるにもかかわらず、オリガルヒとつながりのあるロシアのロビイストを雇った。
尽管担心受贿，Uber还是雇佣了与寡头有联系的俄罗斯说客
儘管擔心受賄，Uber還是僱傭了與寡頭有聯繫的俄羅斯說客
